name: Football Fury
overview: At Last User-Friendly Football! Here's a football game with a difference: it's easy to learn! If you're tired of wading through long, complicated manuals and frustrated by complex controls, how about a game you can just sit down and play? FOOTBALL FURY puts you right into the action, with all the great strategy and play options of the real thing. Whether you're a rookie or a seasoned pro, if you like your football fast and furious... FOOTBALL FURY is your game!
